availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William L. Fuller (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Fuller and Nancy Fuller. Married to Hannah A. Fuller. Father of George A. Fuller. Farmer in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 196A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 812.
